Promoting OnlyFans on Twitter: 11 Powerful Methods that Work

OnlyFans’ popularity as a content marketplace has grown over the years. It’s become every model’s preferred platform for showcasing products and services.

Is it Hard to Make Money on OnlyFans? Finally, a Vivid Answer is Provided

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 12 sec

There is no direct answer to this question. There are models who successfully make so much money in a short period while others end up making little to no money. But, if you take time to study how the successful ones maintain their status quo, you will realize that there are specific factors that favored their growth from the start until now such as having an initial following, an experienced team, the right skills, time to create content, and a sustainable budget.

Countless models desire to make money on OnlyFans as a side hustle simply because they heard a fellow model recommend the platform. If you have come across several YouTube videos hyping the notion of making a steady income from OnlyFans and quitting your 9-5 job or array of jobs, kindly, hold your horses and listen. Making money on OnlyFans is both hard and easy based on various factors.  

Currently, most models are finding it hard to make money on OnlyFans because they are either ignorant or they do not have an expert to guide them through the process. Fortunately, this article will equip you with the right knowledge to ease your OnlyFans money-minting journey and let you in on a secret that will propel you to success effectively.

Make an appointment now

So, From the Available Data, Why the Hype? And Can You Make Money on OnlyFans?

What is fueling the OnlyFans hype? OnlyFans referral program. Those YouTube videos you have watched for hours while fantasizing how you can make so much money from OnlyFans are mostly motivated by OnlyFans referral program.

The creators of the YouTube videos are in for the 5% commission they will get off of you signing up for OnlyFans through their affiliate links. This is not to say that every YouTube creator talking about OnlyFans is out to coerce you to bite the bait, some are genuinely trying to help you.

Initially, OnlyFans creators earned a 5% commission for every creator they referred to the platform for a lifetime. The 5% commission was calculated against the creator’s profits but paid by OnlyFans. This meant that OnlyFans catered for the 5% commission and not the referred creator. OnlyFans takes 20% of what a creator makes on their platform indicating that the 5% cut from their side to the referrers was not an issue. 

The opportunity to earn 5% of OnlyFans’ creators’ work was open to everyone. Anyone could setup an OnlyFans page, generate their referral link and promote it to various models. Getting clicks was easy because OnlyFans was a haven for models to sell their NSFW “not safe for work” content. 

For years, sex workers, club strippers, and other adult content creators earned pennies from exploitative porn websites and other third parties who sold content on their behalf. OnlyFans presented a one-time chance for them to start selling their exclusive content and keep 80% of the amount they make. Therefore, anyone could easily market their OnlyFans link to the sheer number of NSFW content creators who were migrating over to OnlyFans. That is why there are so many YouTube videos and articles dated around late 2019 and during 2020 promoting OnlyFans with affiliate links. 

Unfortunately, due to the surge in the number of people signing up, OnlyFans decided to reduce the 5% earning extent to a year. Many creators, supposedly sex workers, porn actors, and club strippers created an OnlyFans page during the pandemic period in 2020 due to lockdowns and health safety reasons. Despite the change, the recommendations have not stopped because there is $50,000 to be made off of every successful referee one makes. 

During the 2020 pandemic period, several models made a great income from OnlyFans while working from home. For example, Bella Thorne raked in more than $1,000,000 in 24hrs after setting up her OnlyFans page. It was that lucrative. But, bear in mind that Bella Thorne had an initial following that favored her quick growth to success. The same applies to many of the other top OnlyFans earners such as Blac Chyna, Cardi B, and Mia Khalifa.  

Currently, so much has changed and the easy OnlyFans money era is no more. Numerous OnlyFans creators earn an average of $180 monthly. The top 1% of OnlyFans creators keep 33% of the profit cake and the top 10% of creators keep 73% of the profits generated. Therefore, at least 90% of OnlyFans creators, majority being female models, are struggling to earn a serious income from OnlyFans. 

On the other side, data shows you that the OnlyFans money minting era is just starting. OnlyFans registers around 500,000 new users each day. It has paid out more than $2 billion to creators. Also, top earners averagely make a monthly income amounting to $100,000.

OnlyFans has more than 170 million users and the numbers keep increasing. Why? OnlyFans has implemented earning features that are in complete support of their creators. For example, the pay per view (PPV) feature aids creators earn from messaging exclusive content to their loyal fans.

The fact sticks, without creators OnlyFans would cease to exist. So, OnlyFans aims to protect creators’ content while educating them on how to sell content using various features and how to promote their content.

As a creator, it is your responsibility to research and curve a success story for yourself. Here are factors you must consider before creating an OnlyFans page because they determine whether you will face hardships trying to earn on OnlyFans or have a smooth sail. 

Make an appointment now

How Do You Know If It Will Be Easy or Hard for You to Make Money on OnlyFans? 

OnlyFans is a serious business and you cannot go into it blindly expecting to miraculously make money. The top 0.1% know that getting a team to help with running an OnlyFans business is the best option if you want to build a worth it OnlyFans business. But, before you think about starting an OnlyFans side hustle or full-time endeavor, with a team or alone, assess whether it will be easy or hard for you to make money on OnlyFans by precisely answering these questions:

1. Are You 18 Years and Above?

If you are 18 and below, forget about creating a serious OnlyFans business. OnlyFans requires that you provide details meant to prove that you are 18 and above such as your driving license. Additionally, you must supplement your personal details with your banking information so that your account can be approved. 

If you are 18 and below but feel like you can produce content and sell it on OnlyFans, avoid using illegal tactics such as faking details to gain access to the platform. Use other content sharing and selling platforms such as Patreon. Faking your details on OnlyFans might get you into legal trouble in case you are caught and inevitably get your name tarnished in the media and lose all your subscribers. 

Even if you successfully fake your details, you will have a hard time marketing your content because some of your audience might realize that you are not above 18 yet you own an OnlyFans account. This makes it hard for you to make money on OnlyFans. Therefore, only create OnlyFans content when you are of age. 

2. If You Decide to Create Adult Content, Are You Ready for Future Career Issues?

Adult content creation and selling receives a negative reaction from society. If you do decide to create and sell adult content on OnlyFans, ensure you are comfortable and ready to bear any future career consequences. Being okay with what you are doing allows you to go all out without worrying what may follow, allowing you to make money easily because you know how to respond to cynics. 

Realize that there are some companies that do not want anything to do with OnlyFans creators. They view such creators as people helping rot the society without even inquiring what content a creator makes on OnlyFans. The negative reaction is due to 70% of OnlyFans content being NSFW. 

If you do decide to create adult content anonymously, ensure you have a backup strategy in case a leak occurs. The strategy should shield you from any career projection issues and allow you to keep growing despite a leak occurring. Having a backup strategy allows you to focus on content creation and marketing rather than worrying. 

3. If You Decide to Create Adult Content, Are You Comfortable with Friends and Family Knowing?

If you are uncomfortable with your family and friends knowing that you create adult content on OnlyFans, you can create faceless content. Creating, promoting, and selling faceless OnlyFans content can be hard but it is possible as long as you have a clear mindset and have a working strategy. Some of the content you can focus on include masked videos, cosplay fetishes, and foot pics.

Going down the faceless content creation road is a valid option, but you need to know the rules to follow and the proper approach. You also need to take note of the consequences in case your identity is publicly revealed. That way you will have peace of mind focusing on content creation and selling allowing you to make money easily and worry less.

On the other hand, being comfortable with friends and family knowing that you produce adult content on OnlyFans gives you an advantage because you can focus more and do not need to come up with sketchy ways to hide your identity. If you find friends willing to promote your work, the better. You will grow much faster and make money easily. 

Moreover, couples’ content is gaining traction on OnlyFans. Therefore, if your spouse is comfortable with the two of you creating adult content for netizens, the two of you can make more income from OnlyFans. The two of you support each other throughout the journey, figure out what works and does not, making the whole process effortless.

4. Do You Have a Considerable Budget?

OnlyFans users are only willing to purchase exclusive, quality, and worthwhile content. To consistently produce such content, you need to set aside a budget to cater for the acquisition of content production equipment, upkeep, and team payments in case you will employ extra aid. 

The key content creation equipment you require include cameras, microphones, tripods, backdrops, and lighting sources. You can do with average equipment, but you must know how to tweak the outcome of your content to suit your audience. For example, you can have cameras that shoot standard Full HD (High Definition) videos and photos and use software enhancers to boost the quality of your content. 

You do need to keep money aside to cover for your daily needs as you create content. Additionally, you need some cash to cater for agency consultations and a production team in case you eventually need one. 

Having a considerable budget set aside for all the mentioned reasons allows you to experiment with various strategies until you find one that works for you. You also get to have ample time creating content consistently while marketing it. Lack of a budget makes it hard for you to sustain the whole process leading to menial returns. 

5. How Many Hours Can You Dedicate to OnlyFans?

To make a significant amount of money on OnlyFans, you must plan, create, edit, and post content. Then, you must monitor analytics, adjust your strategy based on findings, and keep creating content. It is a long-term endeavor, that is why you must have a specific number of hours allocated to OnlyFans. 

To determine the number of hours you can dedicate to OnlyFans, analyze your daily activities to spot the hours that you are free. If you desire to work and still create OnlyFans content, you must create a strict schedule else you will find it hard making money on OnlyFans because you will be inconsistent, frustrated with not having enough time, and eventually you might give up. 

Remember, your budget also influences the amount of time you can put into OnlyFans. The greater the budget, the better, because you will not have to worry about making money to sustain your family or daily needs. 

6. Do You Have an Initial Following?

Having an initial audience following helps you start making sales quite fast compared to a creator without one. You create content, lock it and inform your following to find your exclusive content on OnlyFans. The genuine ones will head over to OnlyFans and willingly pay for the content. 

On the other hand, if you lack an initial following, you might find it hard to make money because you first have to get people onboard, convince them, and wait for their response. Despite the hardship, the shortcut to growing quicker is that of consulting an experienced team such as Fandafia’s. 

An experienced team helps you cut down the time required to get a following. They know the ins and outs of OnlyFans and can come up with working strategies in the shortest period possible.  

7. Are You Well Connected?

Having an initial network of friends or acquaintances who create OnlyFans content gives you an edge in the competition because they can help propel you to success easily. You can request for shout-outs from them to make your content known to their fans who might be interested in your content. On the other hand, if you are not well connected, you will have a hard time making cash because you need to invest time in making friends in the industry. 

If you have influencer friends, it will also be easier for you to get fans because you can pay them to promote your content. The influencer friends can also direct you to other influencers who might be able to help in case what they stand for does not resonate with the type of content you make. Either way, you would still have the advantage of getting your presence known quickly compared to other creators who might not have such a privilege. 

8. Do You Have the Right Skills?

Very few OnlyFans creators start their journey without learning specific content production and promotion skills. Most of those who start their journey instantly without the need to acquire skills have a background in content production and promotion and do not need to gain various skills to succeed. If you are not among them, then you will have quite a hard time making money, unless you dedicate time to learning these skills:

  • Videography 

You must learn how to shoot and piece together videos that are catchy and relevant to a specific audience. You must learn how to use various video shooting equipment and maintain them. To gain videography skills, you can either sign up for a premium practical course or buy your own equipment and learn videography using free online courses. 

  • Photography 

Quality images, creatively shot and edited photos sell more on OnlyFans compared to unedited, boring pictures. The only way to obtain quality pictures is to learn how they are taken. Learning photography is straightforward. You do not have to sign up for a premium course, use the freely available learning material as you practice. 

  • Content planning and strategizing

Creating great content takes time, planning, and strategizing. To know how to create valuable content in time and tailor it to a specific audience requires that you know how to strategize and plan. While obtaining the skill, you will learn how to create persona descriptions, analyze the impact of your content, adjust strategies, and more. 

  • Content Marketing 

Promotion is key if you are to make sales on OnlyFans. You must learn how to create marketing strategies, specify whether you will use outbound or inbound marketing tactics, and more. Gaining marketing skills allows you to sell effectively through various channels including social media, search engines and more. 

  • Social Media Management 

You must know how various social media platforms structure interactions and their rules and regulations. Marketing and promotion on various social media platforms works differently. For example, the way you market on TikTok is not the same as YouTube. Knowing how to approach promotion on various platforms allows you to improve your OnlyFans sales more effectively.  

  • Ability to socialize and connect with other creators 

In an industry filled with already established creators, some of which make millions of dollars each month, you cannot afford having poor communication skills. You must learn how to network and seal collaboration deals with fellow creators and other people in the OnlyFans space in general.

9. Do You Know of Any Agency You Can Consult?

Many of the successful OnlyFans models have a team of experts backing them up. Most of these teams are OnlyFans agencies that guide the models on how to grow their followings, serve their audiences better, and make more money. At times, the agencies go in and run the whole business for the models leaving them with the task of creating content only. 

A good OnlyFans agency helps you interact efficiently with your fans, market your content, sell your content through various methods, and give you a fair share of what you make. You need to research and know various agencies such as Fandafia that you can entrust your business to because at some point, you must consult a professional to guide you in case you are to make money easily. 

10. Have You Made Content Before?

This is a test of experience. Having previous content creation experience is a great boost in terms of making sales on OnlyFans. The same knowledge you use to create content for other platforms mostly applies to OnlyFans.

The whole approach of determining the objectives of your content, defining who it is for, doing a competitor study, producing the content, editing it, and posting it applies to OnlyFans. Therefore, lacking previous knowledge on how to make content derails your chances of making money on OnlyFans. 

Additionally, having previous content creation knowledge helps you make less mistakes. It would be easier for you to create a content creation strategy and schedule compared to a newbie. You can easily engage with your audience because you have concrete knowledge on how various audiences react to different triggers and what particular comments mean. 

11. Do You Know How to Undertake a Competitor Analysis?

If more than 70% of the content on OnlyFans is NSFW, it means you must know how to carry out a competitor analysis in case you plan to create NSFW content. Even if you want to create other types of content such as fitness, cooking, and knowledge sharing content, you still need to know how to properly study your competitors and deliver unique content. 

Competition keeps the demand for OnlyFans content running because there is variety to choose from. If people have a variety to choose from, then, why should they choose you? A concrete reason such as producing valuable content that the audience cannot obtain from any other platform sets you apart from the other creators. 

To carry out a competitor analysis, you must first identify the competitors, collect details about what they offer and their pricing, analyze your competitor’s weaknesses and strengths, and finally derive a competitive advantage report that you can rely on to come up with content that sells more than your competitors. 

12. Which Niche Can You Consistently Create Content For?

Currently, the NSFW niche is saturated, but that does not mean you cannot make money producing NSFW content. You have a better chance at producing non-adult content such as fitness content because there is high demand and low supply. 

If you are to make it as an NSFW creator, you must be creative. Creativity in terms of content creation and promotion will set you apart from all the other numerous creators trying their lack with NSFW content. For example, you can combine traveling with NSFW content.

You are supposed to select a niche based on the market value and demand. If the market value of a niche is high and the demand is also high, you should take time to learn and obtain proper knowledge about the niche and start creating content. 

You must carry out a market analysis to determine the market value and demand because you are aiming to make money on OnlyFans and the only sure way to know if you will make money is by knowing the demand and supply of the content you want to create. 

Conclusion

Making money on OnlyFans is both easy and hard based on various factors that you must put into consideration. This article provides you with precise questions that you must answer to determine whether you will have an easy or hard time making money on OnlyFans. Be truthful to yourself while providing answers to these questions because falsifying any of the answers to pamper your emotions will later cost you. 

If you find that most of your answers disadvantage you and indicate that you will have a hard time generating income on OnlyFans, do not hesitate to reach out to Fandafia. They have a team of experts ready to help you grow your OnlyFans following, boost sales, engage with fans, and more. Book your appointment with them now.
